;It seems that almost weekly a brand new type of tablet is hitting the market but how you do know which tablet will meet your requirements? Out of all the choices you have for your tablet, the Motorola Xoom and the iPad 2 are usually right at the top of the list. Not to mention the quickness in which new tablets are now being produced makes it difficult to keep up with the newest ones. Among the newer tablets that have been released would be the Samsung Galaxy Tab, which deserves some attention. This is a smaller tablet that offers some good functions, and the cost actually makes it a reasonable alternative. Listed below you'll find some of the features that this small device brags on.
;
;While this tablet features 16GB of memory, the advantage that it comes with a memory slot is fantastic because you can use this specific slot to add 32 more GB of memory. The product itself is run off of Android 2.2 along with the fact that flash works together with this tablet makes it a little better as compared to some others. It comes with a very nice 7 inch touch screen which has a resolution of 1024 x 600 pixels. Although its definitely not the largest of touch screens its clearly a fair size, and the plus side of it being more compact is it can fit into your pocket easily. Think you might fit an iPad in any of your pockets. Unless you still have your old parachute pants from the 80's, then only maybe. Along with the 3d like imagery, you will see that the graphics on this modest guy doesn't leave you wanting. It has the ability to take video and take photos with flash as it features a rear 3MP digital camera as well as a 1.3MP front facing camera designed for video chatting. It is WiFi enabled and has Bluetooth 3.0 functionality also. Furthermore, it can hook up with the Internet with a fast 3G connection and the tab is actually GPS enabled, helping you to find real-time directions on a 3D map which moves as you do. If you wish to be impressed a bit more, the battery is a 4000 mAH battery, which will operate for about 13 hours. The Galaxy Tab weighs just 13.4 ounces and it has the actual dimensions of 7.5 x 4.8 x 0.4 inches.
